attributes.action: Fix the price of LPG and stop raising the price by 1 penny each month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a driver using a vehicle which is powered by LPG. If the price continues to go up at the current rate then LPG will no longer be a viable alternative or the cost effective fuel it could be. If the PM is really serious about the Green ISSUES, with respect, should realise that the miles/litre ratio and indeed the overall cost of the vehicle will either persuade or disuade the motorist.
